name: WeightOfExistence
description:
Controls

W/UP Arrow: To Flap wings (go up & forward).

A/Left & D/Right: Horizontal movement 

Objective

Try to stay above the gaseous clouds, while avoiding obstacles.

Concept

To highlight overthinking, depressive thoughts & their physical impact.

Story

In the skies above a certain gas giant are born SkyRays, a sensitive creature able to communicate across the planet through a network of linked individuals. Each Ray is born with a burden to provide a link to the rest of the species. Our story tracks one such individual.
